item.title: Television
item.description: Note: It is recommended that beginners get comfortable with Node Red and more simple HomeKit configurations of this plugin before attempting to set up Television Service. Services The Television Service is a complicated one. At its most basic it will be an on/off device that can send and receive the message {"Active":0} and {"Active":1}. In order to use additional features there needs to be linked services including (but not limited to) Input Source and Television Speaker.
